title: Hagure Seirei Ino Shinsatsu Kiroku~ Seijo Kishi-dan to Iyashi no Kamiwaza ~ - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Army   Average-looking Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Doctors   Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Healers   Magic   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Military   Naive Protagonist   Politics   Royalty   Special Abilities   Spirit Users   Spirits   Sword And Magic   Wars
author: Akatsuki Touwa   Toowa   とーわ   朱月十話
description: Glass loses his path in life when he pulls a “flop” during his spirit summoning ceremony. However, he is given another chance when he receives a royal order to fight in the front lines, along with the Princess’s knights, as a war doctor. With his “flop” capable of curing anything, the curtains unfold upon a new fantasy war chronicle!>
